name: Application of the First Stage
effect:
Target: Every Water Ninja opposing the user
Effect: The target becomes a Stand-By Ninja.
"It's an application of the first stage of my Rasengan training!"

name: Chakra Eater Sword
effect:
Effect: Discard 3 of your opponnet's Chakra.
Expert [Kisame Hoshigaki]: Move the same number of cards you discarded due to this effect from your Discard Pile to your Chakra area. If you moved 3 or more cards this way, injure target opposing Ninja.
"My long sword is called Samehada! It means sharkskin! It doesn't slice… it cuts you to ribbons!"

name: Chidori
effect:
Requirements: Sasuke Uchiha or Kakashi Hatake
Effect: The user gets +5/+0 during this turn. If the user wins any Victory during this turn, give 1 Damage to 1 of your opponent's healthy Stand-By Ninjas.
"He chose me to be the one to kill him!"

name: Chiyo
effect:
Sand | Female | Mental Power: 1 | Puppet Master
[RETIRED MASTER]
When this Ninja is put in play, you can search for 1 "Puppet" Ninja card in your Deck, show it to your opponent and place it in your hand. Then, shuffle your Deck.
"Come on! I was just joking! Ha ha ha!"

name: Choji Akimichi
effect:
Leaf | Genin | Male | Mental Power: -1 | GROWTH
[INFURIATION]
When this Ninja is sent out to Battle, you can remove from game 1 coin on target card.
"Pleasingly Plump Forever!!"

name: Dango
effect:
Target: 1 Ninja
Effect: Draw 1 card, then move up to 3 cards from your Discard Pile to your Chakra area. The target gets +1/+1 during this turn for each card moved this way.

name: Deidara
effect:
Akatsuki | Rogue Ninja | Jonin | Male

Leaf | Special Jonin | Male | Mental Power: 1

name: Eyes of the Betrayer
effect: Effect: Draw 1 card, then remove this Mission from the game. In that case, take an extra turn after this one. You cannot play Missions on that extra turn.

name: Formidable Team
effect: Effect: If the user's Team has a "Shadow" Ninja, 1 Ninja opposing the user becomes 0/0 during this turn. If the user's Team has a "Food" Ninja, injure 1 Ninja opposing the user. If the user's Team has a "Mind" Ninja, 1 Ninja opposing the user becomes a Stand-by Ninja.
"What's amazing are my friends who believe in me."

name: Futaba
effect:
Leaf | Ninja Academy Student | Female

name: Gaara of the Desert
effect:
Sand | Satoosa | Male

When this Ninja Attacks, you can reveal the top 3 cards of your Deck. In that case, move 1 revealed Wind Jutsu card or Wind Mission card to your hand, then return the rest to the top of your Deck in any order.
"Very well."

name: Generations
effect:
Permanent (3)
Effect: Ninjas that share a name with another Ninja cannot be sent out to Attack.

name: Genjutsu Adept
effect:
Permanent
Target: 1 Ninja

name: Giant Eagle
effect:
Land of Mountains | Animal
Effect: If an effect discards 2 or more cards from your Deck, reveal them, and move 1 of them to your hand. In that case, discard 1 card from your hand.
Effect: Your Discard Pile cannot be affected by effects.

Sound | Male | Prisoner | AMBUSH

Sound | Jonin | Female | Mental Power: 2

Target: 1 Ninja

Leaf | Chunin | Female | Mental Power: 1 | Byakugan | Main Branch | GROWTH

name: Ino Yamanaka
effect:
Leaf | Chunin | Female | Mental Power: 1 | Medical | GROWTH
[PRESSING]
When this Ninja is put in play, you can reveal the top 2 cards of your Deck. If there are 1 or more Ninja cards among them, place 1 of them in your hand. Then return the rest and shuffle the Deck. Otherwise, return them to the top or bottom of your Deck in any order.

"Come on! He told us to hurry up!"

Note: This card can be misprinted as N-500 instead of N-595, the correct number for the card is N-595.

Sound | Sannin | Male | Mental Power: 1

Permanent
